articles.title: Bob Odenkirk is related to King Charles in surprise 'Finding Your Roots' reveal - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: Watch a surprised Bob Odenkirk learn he's related to King Charles: 'I'm not a monarchist. I don't believe in that.'
articles.content:
All hail Bob Odenkirk, the Duke of Hollywood.
The actor, 61, appears in Tuesday's new episode of PBS' genealogy series Finding Your Roots, where he's surprised to learn that he and King Charles are … [+2091 chars]
